entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
